Add session and flash message support

Add session and flash message support

This add support on the *baseContext for sessions using gorilla/sessions

Additionally a basic flash messages implementation is added which uses
the session implementation.

Merge pull request #49 from Slacki/master

Corrected typo in config.go

Fix Automigrate configuration

This fixes loading of automigration setting. A typo cause this to always be
false

Fix breaking API changes

The new API for gorm has changed , hopeful this reflects the new changes

Support fine grained migrations

The configuration file now has Automigation field which defaults true. Turning
this off disables automigration whereby the user can call utron.Migrate() to do
the migrations anywhere in the application.

Closes #19

Add RenderJSON to *BaseController

This adds helper method for rendering objects as json responses.
*BaseController.RenderJSON encodes the value and renders output as JSON.

Merge pull request #27 from gernest/routes

Fix routing

Fix routing

This fixes routing precedence between routes defined in routes file,
routes defined in Routes field and standard routes.

The order in which routes are registered is

- routes file
- Routes field
- standard routes

Merge pull request #9 from gernest/env

Overide config values from environment variables

Overide config values from environment variables

The *Config.SyncEnv() overides the values of any field  that is set in the
environment. The method will look for names in the environment that
matches an uppercassed, underscore separated string of the corresponding
field name.

Example
  For the field AppName, the method will look for APP_NAME in the
environment.

Only int, string and bool fields are overidden, unsupported fields are
ignored.
